text: Munu yumo anapalanyweke mmakono mwa anevo vafalume, nkuhwena unahaulanga habali dyanga Lutu kwanga Ablamu, Mweblaniya achiikâla pepi na milandi ya chinnungu yanga Mamle, Mwamoli. Mamle ávele nnangawake Eshikoli na Aneli, na vanu anevo vatatu, anepo patandi vátendile lilailano lya kuyangatana nawi Ablamu.
